newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Philippine bourse resumes trading - official.
newsitem.headline: Philippine bourse resumes trading - official.

text.p: The Philippine Stock Exchange (PSE) said trading had resumed after being halted for more than an hour by a technical problem.
"We started trading but there will be no extension of trading hours," said Harry Liu, PSE governor.
Trading starts at 9:30 a.m. (0130 GMT) and ends at 12:00 noon (0400 GMT).
The PSE's public relations department said it will issue an official statement on the details concerning the technical problem.
